title: The Karma Theme Lyrics From U Turn Tamil 2018 Film
stanzas:
thisai thirumbinalum
kadal mazhai kadanthu ponalum
manam thirinthinalum
vazhi ranam marandhu ponalum

sagaa.. kaalam thooram
engae sendraalum.
sagaa... vinai
unnai thodum.

un sirippukku vithai neethaan
un kanneerukum
orey vidai, neethaan.
ambu vitta vedan neethaan,
ambai thaangum nenjam
neethaan.
manam thirinthinalum!!

kanaa kalaindha pothum
yedho vinaa, ennai panthaadum.
evan varaintha maayam
ivan ival verum aththiyaayam

sagaa.. ....
kaalam theeraathaa .
sagaa... ellai illaa gagaa

thaedi chellum kangal neethaan
kannil kaanum
pimbam yaethum neethaan.
pimbam kaattum
paathaai, neethaan.
pathai sendru serum idam
neethaan.
evan varaintha maayam!!

neeye vithai
mazhai neeye.
maram neeye.
neeye kilai
kani neeye
marupadi neeye.
vithai neeye
mazhai maram neeye.
kizhai neeye
kani marupadi neeye.

sagaa.. kaalam thooram
engae sendraalum.
sagaa... vinai
unnai thodum.

vithai neeye
mazhai maram neeye.
kizhai neeye
kani marupadi .
manam thirinthinalum!!

seo.title: The Karma Theme Lyrics From U Turn Tamil 2018 Film
seo.description: Get the complete The Karma Theme Lyrics From U Turn Tamil 2018 Film from U Turn Tamil. Read the lyrics penned by Subu and composed by Anirudh and sung by Anirudh. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Subu, U Turn Tamil, Anirudh, Anirudh, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
